head.title: Creative Technology Ltd.(CREAF,NNM) reports earnings for 4th qtr to Jun 30

hedline.hl1: Creative Technology Ltd.(CREAF,NNM) reports earnings for 4th qtr to Jun 30

block.p: b-Included one-time noncash charges of $ 19,189,000 for the write-off of impaired assets in the quarter and year. The year also included a one-time charge of $ 7 million for the write-off of in-process technology due to the acquisition of Digicom Systems Inc. in the second fiscal quarter. Excluding these one-time charges, the quarter would have showed a net loss of $ 4.8 million, or 6 cents a share, and the year would have had a net income of $ 52.7 million, or 59 cents a share. c-Net income (Loss) The company has written off $ 6.3 million of investments in Creative Insights, an associated company, due to the cessation of their operations. In accordance with the Statement of Financial Accounting Standards No. 121, ''Accounting for the Impairment of Long-Lived Assets and for Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed Of,'' the company has taken write-offs of $ 5 million for its investments in Datastream Corporation and $ 3.4 million in Voice Processing Corporation. The company has also taken a write-down of $ 4.5 million in its investment in Digicom Systems Inc. These charges were the results of changes in future sales estimates and the resulting cash flows and other factors.
